page.title: 17Street Games:"KINGY"
page.content: A favourite street game is{KINGY.}You can have as many players as you want, and you pick one person to be 'on'. All the players stand in a circle with their legs apart. The King then bounces a ball. The person whose legs the ball passes through is ' on'. That person then counts whilst the others flee. When he has finished the agreed count, he tries to hit the others with the ball aiming for the body below the waist to the feet. He can only move by bouncing the ball. If he hits someone, they are then 'on' with him. They may then pass the ball between them before aiming at someone. When every one has been caught you then have to start a fresh game. The first one caught in the previous game is 'on'. The players can only run within an agreed area or else they are 'out'.
